## 🌍 The Problem

> “Where do your materials actually come from?”

- 80% of supply chains are opaque past Tier 1;  
- ESG regulations demand visibility across **all tiers**  
- Most tools stop where real risks begin: the first mile

**SupplyLens** changes that.

---

## 🔍 What is SupplyLens?

**SupplyLens** is an open-source AI platform to:

- Map complex, multi-tier supply chains  
- Infer missing relationships using LLMs  
- Store everything in a unified graph database  
- Query risks and connections in natural language

> _"From chaos to clarity, using reasoning not just reporting."_

---

## ⚙️ How It Works

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
**Tools:**
- Crawl4AI / Custom Ingestion  
- PostgreSQL + Apache AGE  
- pgvector + JSONB  
- LangChain + Ollama  
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Layers:**
1. Input: Reports, documents, web data  
2. AI: Extract + infer nodes & edges  
3. Graph DB: Store structure & semantics  
4. UI: Ask questions, see the logic  
:::
:::

---

## 📈 Architecture

```{mermaid}
flowchart TD

  subgraph Input_Layer[Input Layer: Data Collection]
    A1[Web Crawler or Crawl4AI]
    A2[PDFs and ESG Reports]
    A3[Open Datasets (WikiRate, OS Hub)]
  end

  subgraph AI_Layer[AI Reasoning and Embeddings]
    B1[LLM (Ollama or GPT)]
    B2[Triple Extraction: Subject → Predicate → Object]
    B3[pgvector Embeddings]
  end

  subgraph Graph_Storage[Unified Graph Database]
    C1[PostgreSQL Backend]
    C2[Apache AGE for Graph Structure]
    C3[pgvector for Similarity Search]
    C4[JSONB Metadata: ESG Scores, Confidence, Sources]
  end

  subgraph Query_Interface[Natural Language Interface]
    D1[LangChain or LlamaIndex]
    D2[Chat UI: OpenWebUI or Chainlit]
    D3[n8n: Query Routing and Automation]
  end

  subgraph Infrastructure[Deployment and Control]
    E1[Docker Compose with Profiles]
    E2[HAProxy or Caddy - TLS + Routing]
    E3[Supabase - Auth and Secure Storage]
    E4[Obsidian - Academic Notes Integration]
  end

  %% Connections
  A1 --> B1
  A2 --> B1
  A3 --> B1

  B1 --> B2
  B2 --> C2
  B3 --> C3

  C1 --> C2
  C2 --> D1
  C3 --> D1
  C4 --> D1

  D1 --> D2
  D2 --> D3

  E1 --> C1
  E2 --> D2
  E3 --> D2
  E4 --> B1
```

## 🧠 Are You Sure?

**EU Laws Require This:**

- **CSRD**: ~50,000 firms must report full ESG data  
- **CSDDD (CS3D)**: Due diligence past Tier 1 becomes law

**Research-Backed:**

- LLM + Knowledge Graph = 3x visibility increase  
  _(Cambridge, 2024 EV study)_

**Data-Ready:**

- WikiRate: 7M+ ESG datapoints  
- Open Supply Hub: 100k+ mapped facilities

---

## 🛠️ Can You Do It?

**Yes — we’re building it now:**

- ✅ Stack: PostgreSQL + AGE + pgvector + LangChain  
- ✅ Auth via Supabase, UI via OpenWebUI  
- ✅ Hosted on Proxmox VM with Docker Compose profiles  

**Deployment Site:**  
https://aisandbox1.ixworx.nl
